name: Life After Death (Meaty Okra Games)
description:
Submission for Asymmetrical Jam [8 Bits to Infinity] https://itch.io/jam/asymmetrical-jam

Theme: "Two Alternate Dimensions"

Vikings train their entire life with the hopes to walk through the gates of Valhalla in death. Little do they know of the grand trial that awaits them before their passage.

Developed by: Colin Harris, Michael Probst, and Sam Morris.

This was Colin's very first game jam so cudos to him :)
